WorkItem.Description:
After creating a new chatroom I try to join it - clicking the join button a jquery exception occurs.
 
"WebDev.WebServer40.EXE" (Verwaltet (v4.0.30319)): "C:\Windows\Microsoft.Net\assembly\GAC_MSIL\System.ServiceModel.Web.resources\v4.0_4.0.0.0_de_31bf3856ad364e35\System.ServiceModel.Web.resources.dll" geladen
Microsoft JScript runtime error: 'Object' is undefined
 
Sourcecode: jquery-1.4.1.min.js
WorkItem.Summary: Exception joining chat room in AJAXWebChat
